course_name: Assessment and Evaluation in Applied Psychology
description: Aims to familiarise students with practical details of psychological assessment, interpretation and report writing relating to questions in applied psychology across the three streams of Health, Counselling, and Sport and Exercise. Students are expected to achieve competence in administration and interpretation of a limited number of commonly used assessment devices. In addition, students will produce a specialist folio that focuses on specific programme evaluation techniques relevant to their chosen specialist stream of Health, Counselling, or Sport and Exercise Psychology.
restricted: Restricted to MAppPsych students or with permission of Director Applied Psychology programs
